mapper.select: SELECT * FROM IsuFieldDefine WHERE defaultShowInFilters IS NOT NULL ORDER BY filterOrdr ASC
SELECT * FROM IsuFieldDefine WHERE defaultShowInColumns IS NOT NULL ORDER BY columnOrdr ASC

SELECT fields.* FROM ( (SELECT CONCAT('sys-', fieldDefine.id) `key`, fieldDefine.id, fieldDefine.code, fieldDefine.label, fieldDefine.type, fieldDefine.input, fieldDefine.fullLine, fieldDefine.columnOrdr ordr
FROM IsuFieldDefine fieldDefine WHERE fieldDefine.defaultShowInPage IS NOT null ORDER BY fieldDefine.elemOrdr ASC)
UNION
(SELECT CONCAT('cust-', customField.id) `key`, customField.id, customField.myColumn code, customField.label, customField.type, customField.input, false AS fullLine, customField.ordr
FROM IsuCustomField customField
WHERE orgId = #{orgId} ORDER BY customField.ordr ASC) ) fields WHERE fields.key NOT IN ( SELECT elem.key FROM IsuPageElement elem WHERE elem.tabId = #{tabId} )
